module.name: design_product_data_management
module.name.french: Gestion des donnÃ©es du produit de conception
module.keywords: module, product data management, approval, identification, test select

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of product data management in the context of electrical and electromechanical design processes.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
he following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been added:
he following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been removed:
The following ARM EXPRESS data types have been added:
The following ARM EXPRESS data types have been modified:
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
The following MIM EXPRESS data types have been added:
The following MIM EXPRESS data types have been modified:

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Activity method assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1249;
items within the scope of application module Attribute classification, ISO/TS 10303-1246;
items within the scope of application module Classification with attributes, ISO/TS 10303-1111;
items within the scope of application module Generic material aspects, ISO/TS 10303-1681;
items within the scope of application module Information rights, ISO/TS 10303-1241;
items within the scope of application module Item definition structure, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1345;
items within the scope of application module Pre defined product data management specializations, ISO/TS 10303-1760;
items within the scope of application module Product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1231;
items within the scope of application module Requirement assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1233;
items within the scope of application module Requirement view definition relationship, ISO/TS 10303-1142;
items within the scope of application module Specification control, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1112;
items within the scope of application module Test select product, ISO/TS 10303-1757.
